typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ClickRetailWebLob_Raw
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Product
ClickRetailWebLob_Raw, Product lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sort(asc(ERROR_FUNCTION(''), true)) ~> Sort1
